title: Lab That Created Risky Avian Flu Had “Unacceptable” Biosafety Protocols
description:
Documents obtained by The Intercept reveal disturbing biosafety lapses and troubling gaps in oversight by government agencies.

The post Lab That Created Risky Avian Flu Had “Unacceptable” Biosafety Protocols appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Accident With 1918 Pandemic Virus Raises Questions About Pathogen Research
description:
A researcher working with the 1918 flu virus was bit by an infected ferret and sent home to quarantine.

The post Accident With 1918 Pandemic Virus Raises Questions About Pathogen Research appeared first on The Intercept.

title: Student Infected With Debilitating Virus in Undisclosed Biolab Accident
description:
By the time a researcher who pricked her finger in Missouri reported the accident, she was already sick.

The post Student Infected With Debilitating Virus in Undisclosed Biolab Accident appeared first on The Intercept.

title: AIPAC's First Attack Ad in Midterms Hits Would-Be Squad Member Summer Lee
description:
Internal polls show the race for the deep-blue seat tightening. The GOP and AIPAC are going for the jugular.

The post AIPAC’s First Attack Ad in Midterms Hits Would-Be Squad Member Summer Lee appeared first on The Intercept.
